title: RITO Y U DO DIS (Too many Poros)
body: I'm broke at the moment but poro ward skins... {{summoner:31}}  Does my car really need petrol that much >.> I could always take up jogging...{{summoner:6}}

replies.body: . ;))) poro king~ i can't stop play it ;C FOR THE PORO KING ICONNN
Not going to be the voice of reason?
Just do what I do when you want petrol, let your mother borrow your car.
Do you need to ask  {{summoner:30}}  Demands that you buy all the {{summoner:31}}
Is a Riotor promoting his Companies game over the livylihood of another person? Tsk Tsk
